tokens.resolved_gloss: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
tokens.translation: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, iteration or continuance; used only adverbially (with or without preposition), again, repeatedly, still, more

tokens.resolved_gloss: a puff, i.e. wind, angry or vital breath, divine inspiration, intellect. or (concretely) an animal
tokens.translation: a puff, i.e. wind, angry or vital breath, divine inspiration, intellect. or (concretely) an animal

tokens.resolved_gloss: wind; by resemblance breath, i.e. a sensible (or even violent) exhalation; figuratively, life, anger, unsubstantiality; by extension, a region of the sky; by resemblance spirit, but only of a rational being (including its expression and functions)
tokens.translation: wind; by resemblance breath, i.e. a sensible (or even violent) exhalation; figuratively, life, anger, unsubstantiality; by extension, a region of the sky; by resemblance spirit, but only of a rational being (including its expression and functions)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, the nose or nostril; hence, the face, and occasionally a person; also (from the rapid breathing in passion) ire
tokens.translation: properly, the nose or nostril; hence, the face, and occasionally a person; also (from the rapid breathing in passion) ire
